TopicTitle: What did you do in KSP1 today?

Articles.Content:
Terror in the skies over the Abandoned Airfield

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/4915761/screenshot19.png

Cant be Jeb, not smiling.

Put the final spoke into place for Space Station Mere in Munar orbit and sent up/docked a fuel canister (that took two tries; the initial design didn't have sufficient delta-V to make it into Munar orbit, to say nothing about rendezvous operations). At this point the station is fully capable of fulfilling its primary task: supporting multiple excursions to the surface. I plan to send up five more modules to dock at the spokes along the ring, and then I get to start sending up nodes to link the ring segments together.

How did you resist the urge to put Claws for its claws?

I tried that at first, it... looked odd.
Landed a kerbal on Venus, and then returned him safely. Forgot to take surface sample. Fought the 64 bit right mouse button bug endlessly.

Landed a kerbal on Venus, and then returned him safely. Forgot to take surface sample.

No that's no good. Send him back there again.

Seriously though, i can't wait to see that mission :]

Edited September 17, 2014 by Overfloater

I got Jeb to Minmus with so much extra fuel that I was able to descend entirely on the travel stage and use the lander's generous fuel (it was made for the Mun) to hop between Biomes for SCIENCE! I also experimented with using the high-thrust Karbonite engine I recently unlocked as a launch stage, but it burns through fuel at an unbelievable rate.

Opps. It restored the wrong saved text.

Been away from home, and my computer for a while. Just did my first IVA docking. Tense but fun.

So... I built a plane.

http://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/22839222192371398/76691D55F5C414452D71CC1FB3DC6B0777424293/

In order to carry a rocket-lobster

http://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/22839222192369065/38B1D70020BDFF9BD5D3CFC3A1D0C80E1C03A162/

I think you just uncovered the origin of the Kraken(s).

"Your rocket exists because we allow it, and it will end because we demand it."
I went without roads today.
haven't done anything in last 2-3 days. I had an exam at the university today and I have one tomorrow. If I pass them both I will get my bachelor's degree in computer science

Startet my mun outpost with the karbonite mining- and refining facilities. Jeb was busy ...

To show your album, try [ imgur ]ZJNcU[ /imgur ]. You'll need to take the spaces out from between the brackets. Nice looking initial Mun base, BTW.

Thanx ...

Startet my mun outpost with the karbonite mining- and refining facilities. Jeb was busy ...

Javascript is disabled. View full album
I covered Duna in lava!

Today i try to build a ground power station, for transmitting electric power to Kerbol Explorer, forming a network wiz Solar Sation 1, and to be completed wiz some relay satellites, and other power sources.

i made a try wiz green LLL power plant, which seams produce 45/min electricity, thinking about 4000 KE need, as solarstation provide 2000 at best, i saw that a so 45x10=450x10=4500 BWAAAAHHH !!

So... my first train: the Green train

but, cauz i try warp speed, i was crush by the Kraken, and loose my arm preview for recycle the wheels once installed

then i realize that i havnt test the ladder, and cant go back in the pod !p hopefully, their's seat on green power plant

as the drive wasnt easy, and the battery need recharge, so i launch the main building, which is the transmission tower

i stop at the first good place, but i realize that's only 2.6 km from KSC, to close for me

I finally found a good place at 15 km south form KSC, after a long drive, wiz repair mission need

I finally drop the green train at 5km from KSC, too slow, i will relaunch him but by the air

Worked some more on the mini jet parts (0.625m) and made some basic-jet parts to go with the turbo-jet parts from a few days ago. Plus aerodynamic pylons.

Edited September 18, 2014 by NecroBones

Worked some more on the mini jet parts (0.625m) and made some basic-jet parts to go with the turbo-jet parts from a few days ago. Plus aerodynamic pylons.

PIC

PIC

PIC

I do wish KSP had stock .625m jet engines. I like building small planes. It would be great for small UAVs.

did you said small planes?

http://www.kerbalx.com/crafts/89

Today I tested out a bunch of stuff I made. I still suck a textures I:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

i deliver green train to power facility

Green train v2, now wiz balloons !!

I start by a fan version, but it has bad rotation, and not enough electic power, so i put turbojet on rotatron, enabling fats turn rate, and 60m/s at cruise speed at 3500m, permit fast efficient delivery

Only had time for a single Mere rendezvous mission last night. Thought I was going to rip off one of the ring modules already in place but managed to finagle my way on into the dock. The module I sent up and the module I collided with are ready to be joined together. I'm not 100% sure that the docking node I've got that will join them is the right size or not; it looked like it would be in the VAB but in practice it looks like it might be too small. I guess with any luck I'll find out tonight.

Got another Class E spud coming within 500,000 meters of Kerbin in another couple of days; my tater catcher is up and its orbit is aligned. Probably going to attempt a capture here in another day or two.

Kicked off my Juno Minmus Exploration Program (JMiEP) by designing a small rover with a skycrane system. Preliminary testing was a success. Will go launch in a few days. Manned missions will then follow.

Played a bit more 64 bits in a science game... did about 180 science from multiple Kerban biomes and kerban orbits. Is it just me or The Kerbonauts faces animation a laggy in 64bits ? at any rate, almost unlocked the fuel lines then off to minmus to really unlock the tree.

Landed an new class of lander on Gilly.

It contains the extraplanetary launchpad functionality include mining and workshop in one unit.

Plan to use this on Dress, Eeloo and Moho too, however getting 100 ton + fuel to land to Moho will be an challenge.

One idea is to bundle an small kethane mining probe who can land and refuel the big lander in Moho orbit.
Went half the distance to my base (I was off a bit with my rover)

I beat the Kraken. Had two Kerbonauts on return from a mission to Mun. During their descent back to Kerbal, I saw that unmistakable Kraken creeping up. I kept a close eye on things, leaving my cursor sit over-top of the position where the 'Recover' button drops down... and the instant I saw it start to drop, I clicked it. The vessel was recovered before the usual explosion, and I was able to keep my science returned and both Kerbonauts. Yay!
